sample.Server

Class DiscController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Server.DiscController

  • public class DiscController
extends java.lang.Object
    Container used as interface to access and change discs representations(folders) and configuration content of discs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiscController(java.nio.file.Path directory)
      Constructor, registers discs and creates them if needed

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> usersOwnedFiles(java.lang.String user)
        Returns map of files that belongs to *user*
        Parameters:
        user - user whose files are listed
        Returns:

      • usersPermsFiles

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> usersPermsFiles(java.lang.String user)
        Returns map of files that *user* is permitted to have access to
        Parameters:
        user - user whose permitted files are listed
        Returns:
        map of relative paths of *users* permitted files with numbers of discs in which they are located

      • IsIn

        public int IsIn(java.lang.String path)
        Determines if file which relative path is represented by path is in discs and which disc is it located in
        Parameters:
        path - relative path of file for which function searches
        Returns:
        disc number of disc with file or -1 if file not found
